医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
幻觉和噩梦可能预示着自身免疫性疾病的发生由剑桥大学和伦敦国王学院的研究人员领导的一个国际团队表示，噩梦和幻觉（或“白日噩梦”）的增加可能预示着狼疮等自身免疫性疾病的发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hallucinations-and-nightmares-could-herald-the-onset-of-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hallucinations-and-nightmares-could-herald-the-onset-of-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6d60a85-f144-4432-8c4a-9537024cb70a Tue, 21 May 2024 14:13:00 -0400 Hallucinations and nightmares could herald the onset of autoimmune diseases
独家：参议员敦促拜登政府阻止欺诈性的奥巴马医改注册强大的参议院财务委员会主席、参议员罗恩·怀登周一表示，需要立即采取更有力的行动，阻止保险经纪人以欺诈方式为平价医疗法案的承保范围登记或更换人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Exclusive-Senator-urges-Biden-administration-to-thwart-fraudulent-Obamacare-enrollments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Exclusive-Senator-urges-Biden-administration-to-thwart-fraudulent-Obamacare-enrollments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5173e2f0-5680-4d6a-ade0-59ee77841221 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:46:06 -0400 Exclusive: Senator urges Biden administration to thwart fraudulent Obamacare enrollments
观察：医疗居民越来越多地避开堕胎禁令州在 KFF 健康新闻的“健康是什么？”节目中，华盛顿首席记者朱莉·罗夫纳 (Julie Rovner) 与美国医学院协会的阿图尔·格罗弗 (Atul Grover) 坐下来讨论了其最近的分析，该分析表明即将毕业的医学生正在避免在禁止堕胎和专业的州接受培训。限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Watch-Medical-residents-are-increasingly-avoiding-abortion-ban-states.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Watch-Medical-residents-are-increasingly-avoiding-abortion-ban-states.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06ffea26-7a01-4668-8a2e-a027fdb06716 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:44:32 -0400 Watch: Medical residents are increasingly avoiding abortion ban states
加拿大老年人新出现的无家可归危机CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）的一篇分析报告作者写道，无家可归不仅发生在年轻人身上，而且还影响到越来越多的老年人，该分析描述了这一正在出现的危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Emerging-crisis-of-homeless-among-older-adults-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Emerging-crisis-of-homeless-among-older-adults-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=897bc1bf-a2e2-467d-ae8a-532a959c5e31 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:42:51 -0400 Emerging crisis of homelessness among older adults in Canada
科学家通过声音揭开蛋白质折叠的秘密通过将数据转换为声音，科学家们发现氢键如何促成闪电般的快速旋转，将一串氨基酸转化为功能性折叠蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Scientists-uncover- Protein-folding-secrets-through-sound.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Scientists-uncover- Protein-folding-secrets-through-sound.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5222679-2549-4b1a-bed5-8368322af976 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:37:49 -0400 Scientists uncover protein folding secrets through sound
胃癌和其他癌症相关研究的最新进展将于 DDW 2024 上公布癌症相关研究，包括胃癌的诊断工具以及胆囊癌和结直肠癌的趋势，将于本周在 2024 年消化疾病周 (DDW) 上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Latest-advances-in-gastric-cancer-and-other-cancer-lated-studies-to-be-presented-at-DDW-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Latest-advances-in-gastric-cancer-and-other-cancer-lated-studies-to-be-presented-at-DDW-2024.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6053fc4c-1f61-422f-bcf5-ba5b2f12e21e Tue, 21 May 2024 12:30:38 -0400 Latest advances in gastric cancer and other cancer-related studies to be presented at DDW 2024
创新的 3D 打印植入物和生物发光工具改变了感官过程研究像疼痛这样的感觉过程并不是普通的现象，它是由大脑和脊髓精心编排的神经和血管相互作用的交响乐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Innovative-3D-printed-implants-and-bioluminescent-tools-transform-sensory-process-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Innovative-3D-printed-implants-and-bioluminescent-tools-transform-sensory-process-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8485f139-4102-4871-8d9a-e5913ae07395 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:26:51 -0400 Innovative 3D-printed implants and bioluminescent tools transform sensory process studies
突破性研究推进人类体外配子发生治疗不孕症根据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 的数据，全世界大约六分之一的人一生中都会受到不孕不育的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Groundwriting-study-advances- human-in-vitro-gametogenesis-for-infertility-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Groundwriting-study-advances- human-in-vitro-gametogenesis-for-infertility-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2fe52e2-de16-4007-95ed-5faa617ffe1f Tue, 21 May 2024 12:22:39 -0400 Groundbreaking study advances human in vitro gametogenesis for infertility treatment
800 万美元的变革性捐款推动了 WEHI 的胰腺癌研究一项为期 10 年的 800 万美元慈善投资将引领胰腺癌的新疗法，并在 WEHI 创建一个新的专门研究中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Transformative-248-million-donation-fuels-pancreatic-cancer-research-at-WEHI-An-Exceptional-248-Million-10.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Transformative-248-million-donation-fuels-pancreatic-cancer-research-at-WEHI-An-Exceptional-248-Million-10.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfc57d61-af44-4b19-bd4c-5a0681c50ae4 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:12:00 -0400 Transformative $8 million donation fuels pancreatic cancer research at WEHI
创新钙钛矿 X 射线探测器增强医学成像能力中国科学院技术研究所（SIAT）与华中师范大学的研究人员合作，开发了一种用于医学成像的高性能钙钛矿X射线互补金属氧化物半导体（CMOS）探测器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Innovative-perovskite-X-ray- detector-enhances-medical-imaging-capability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Innovative-perovskite-X-ray- detector-enhances-medical-imaging-capability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ed5163a-9fbf-4251-9bf1-49db60c46690 Tue, 21 May 2024 11:59:53 -0400 Innovative perovskite X-ray detector enhances medical imaging capabilities
